alert.note: Alert for Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pinal County through 245 PM MST... At 200 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oracle, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oracle, Mammoth, Saddlebrooke, San Manuel, Campo Bonito, Oracle Junction and Biosphere 2. This includes the following highways... Route 77 between mile markers 89 and 116. Route 79 between mile markers 92 and 101. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle
